title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2859/95 of 11 December 1995 concerning the stopping of fishing for anglerfish by vessels flying the flag of Spain
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2859/95 of 11 December 1995 concerning the stopping of fishing for anglerfish by vessels flying the flag of Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Catches of anglerfish in the waters of ICES division VII by vessels flying the flag of Spain or registered in Spain are deemed to have exhausted the quota allocated to Spain for 1995.
Fishing for anglerfish in the waters of ICES division VII by vessels flying the flag of Spain or registered in Spain is prohibited, as well as the retention on board, the transhipment and the landing of such stock captured by the abovementioned vessels after the date of application of this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 20 November 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
